dcterms:creator: Caye Daudt
B. Le Saux
A. Boulch
dcterms:description: The Onera Satellite Change Detection (OSCD) dataset contains Sentinel 2 multidimensional images acquired between 2015 and 2018 from various locations around the world. It includes image pairs with 13 bands of satellite images and provides pixel-level change ground truth for 14 image pairs, focusing on urban changes such as new buildings and streets.
dcterms:title: Onera Satellite Change Detection (OSCD)

dcterms:creator: H. Chen
Z. Shi
dcterms:description: The LIVER-CD dataset consists of 637 high-resolution images focusing on building-related changes, including various types of buildings. It provides bitemporal images annotated by remote sensing experts with binary labels indicating changed and unchanged pixels.
dcterms:title: LIVER-CD

dcterms:creator: H. Chen
Z. Shi
dcterms:description: The RIVER-CD dataset is a new dataset focusing on change detection in high-resolution images, specifically designed for building-related changes. It includes bitemporal images annotated with binary labels.
dcterms:title: RIVER-CD
